title: Interpretation of seeing a school in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, is it good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing school in a dream for a single woman: School is one of the important institutions found in any country in the world, and it is about gathering many children to teach them all the sciences and implement various activities that help them understand life around them. We learn about them in this article through the Encyclopedia website that offers you the interpretation of seeing school in a dream for a single woman. School in a dream means the lessons that a person must learn in his life and the behaviors that he must follow. It also indicates diligence and effort, because school is the first form of effort and effort. It can For anyone to meet in their life, being a “student” is an important job, and at that time everyone is expected to get high grades. It is also the vision of school that a single girl can see because she feels in her subconscious that everyone is waiting for her. To achieve something, maybe Academically, practically or emotionally, more than everyone expects from this girl. This causes her serious embarrassment and it could also be seeing school in a single woman’s dream. This is nothing but remembering childhood memories and nostalgia, as school is the place where a person spends his time More than 15 years during which he made friends, went through happy and sad situations, and had many meanings for life. Therefore, it is natural for him to see this place again in his dream, but what may worry some people and make him need it. Interpretation of repeatedly seeing school in a dream for a single woman , as the repetition of dreams is behind a message that a person needs to understand in his life. These messages may be warning messages and alert him to something that he cannot in reality pay attention to. Therefore, if the study period for an unmarried girl was not the best period in her life or she had an accident during her life School. She dreams of school often, which means that the accident that occurred left a deep psychological impact on her, and this phenomenon still haunts her to this day. Perhaps the danger she was exposed to at that moment threatens her life again, and the subconscious mind interprets her fears in the form of this dream. Interpretation Seeing a school in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried girl who sees a school in a dream is good news that she will take an educational step soon. She may start pursuing higher studies such as a master’s and doctorate, but if she is still a student. This means that she is worried about this The school year and her achievement, so this good news means that she will excel academically. As for the girl’s recurring dream of school, it means that she is very worried about her future because she is afraid. To disappoint those around her who expect a lot from her because they expect her to excel academically with the highest grades or to She is employed in high positions. So seeing her a lot at school is a translation of him saying that he does not feel worthy of doing all this. She feels that she still needs to study and learn and that she is too young for all these expectations. A girl who is waiting for a promotion at work sees her going

title: Interpretation of a wedding dress in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the vision in the case of a pregnant and divorced woman is different, and this is what we will learn in this article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of visions. She will get married soon and will hear good news in the next few days if God willing. The girl will be characterized by good intentions and purity of heart, and the good news is that her parents will approve of her. As for seeing her tearing her dress in a dream, this is evidence of a lack of communication with her. And that her parents are dissatisfied with her, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is wearing a white dress in an atmosphere Sad. It means that one of her relatives is getting sick or losing someone she loves, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream wearing a wedding dress without her consent. This means her connection to something that will not be hers, no matter how much she tries to cling to it. But if she sees in her dream that she is looking for her wedding dress. Evidence that she feels lost and distracted because of something she is thinking about. Seeing one girl in a dream, her wedding dress torn in disarray. Means losing a romantic relationship or breaking up with someone they were in a relationship with. See also: Interpretation of seeing wearing a white dress in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing A wedding dress in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream in a white dress is evidence of her imminent pregnancy. Evidence of the husband’s good condition and his love for his family, and that God gives him abundant sustenance. When seeing a married woman in a dream, wearing a loose white dress. Good news of livelihood and that the affairs of her life It will be easy, God willing. As is clear from seeing her in a dream, she is wearing a tight white dress. About the difficulty of earning money except with great effort, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing a long white dress. The gospel of a long life, God willing, and good news of blessing and abundance of food. The bright white dress In a married woman’s dream. It shows the correct decisions she makes regarding her life matters. A married woman seeing in a dream that her dress is torn is evidence that some of her wishes will come true and others will not. Seeing her in a dream taking off her dress is good news to get rid of problems. And fears. Seeing a married woman in a dream, wearing a clean white dress. Evidence that she enjoys or has received a large inheritance. When a married woman wears a dirty white dress in her dream. Evidence that she is exposed to a difficult situation and crisis. Interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams of a dress White wedding. His wife will give birth to a beautiful baby girl, God willing. A wedding dress in a man’s dream indicates a lot of profit and livelihood, God willing. Or that he will soon obtain a large and reliable position. A man seeing in his dream that he will get married and marry a bride. Indicates his imminent death, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a man sees in a dream that he is escaping from his wedding with his bride, it means that he will be absolved of evil or affliction that could have befallen him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if he sees himself in a dream, then he is married to a dead bride in reality. This woman is asking him to pray. A man’s marriage. Of an ugly woman in a dream means that

title: What did Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen say about the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman: We find that the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman is disputed by many interpreters, because seeing rings varies from one person to another, but in general, rings in a dream are evidence that something will happen. It will happen soon, regardless of how different the material of the ring is. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gold ring for a married woman. Many interpretation scholars have had many opinions regarding the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman, and among these interpreters, as mentioned on the Al-Mukhtaqifun website, we find the following: Interpretation of seeing a ring Gold in a dream for a married woman, interpretation by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that when a married woman sees a gold ring in a dream, this is a praiseworthy vision, because gold is a sign of happiness, goodness, and success. If a married woman sees that someone has given her a gold ring, this is evidence of the abundance of food and money. Many. When a married woman sees in her dream that the ring is not the size of her hand and that she changes it between her fingers, this is a sign of marital problems that this woman faces. If a married woman sees that she is taking off her ring in a dream, this vision is evidence that she will leave her husband soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision A gold ring in a dream for a married woman, interpretation by Ibn Sirin. We find that Ibn Sirin also has rumors about the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman in a dream, and from Ibn Sirin’s interpretations we find the following: If a married woman sees in a dream a gold ring with a mole on it, this is evidence that this woman will live. In fatigue and misery for a period of time, and God knows best. When a married woman sees utensils of gold in a dream, this is evidence that she has committed something sinful and needs to repent. Seeing a married woman in a dream, dead, and using utensils of gold, means that she will live happily and happily in Her life. In many cases, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a golden ring in a married woman’s dream is evidence that her kingdom will disappear. Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman sees in a dream a house that is made of gold, this is evidence that this house will burn, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream an eye made of gold, this is evidence that she will go blind and lose her sight, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gold ring in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. If you see a ring for a married woman in a dream, this is a sign of good nutrition and abundance. If a married woman sees in a dream an eye of gold. Dreaming that her hands turn into golden hands, this is evidence that the movement of her hands will be paralyzed, and God knows best. When a married woman sees that gold turns into silver, this is a sign of a lack of nutrition. If a married woman sees in a dream that silver turns into gold, this is evidence On her abundant livelihood and good condition. If a married woman sees fabric made of gold, this is evidence of her closeness to God Almighty. If she sees pure gold in a dream, this is evidence of sincerity of intention and sincerity in it. If a married woman sees in a dream that her ring is narrowing on her finger

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about eating cheese in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating cheese in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating cheese in a dream is our topic today, which symbolizes more than one sign, which varies according to the social status of the viewer. There are those who said that it indicates the imminent setting of the date of marriage for an unmarried young man or girl, and some of them said that it symbolizes good luck and freedom from trouble. Find out the interpretation of your vision according to the details you remember. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating cheese in a dream? A person often dreams that he buys a type of cheese, or eats it, or just tastes it, and each of them has its own interpretation, whether it is delicious or spoiled, whether it is eaten alone or With other foods such as bread or meat. For example, and we learn about everything related to this dream in the following lines: Seeing cheese in a dream represents an abundance of good deeds. It is a dairy product that basically symbolizes wellness and good health. A fortuneteller may see dry cheese and think that his vision is not good, but on the contrary, it means leaving this land for another country in search of halal food, and God Almighty will help him in what he asks for, and if that. He is the one who seeks knowledge and seeks it outside his homeland and acquires more from it. Seeing a person struggling and taking responsibility is a sign of God’s help and abundant strength according to his effort and endeavor, as long as he is not lazy and dependent on others. If the plate is filled to the brim with cheese in the dream of the poor person who was in distress during the season The former tried to pray to God (Glory be to Him) to grant him His bounty, a sign of the end of all the causes of worry and torment that he experienced and his transition to a higher standard of living, and that the doors of livelihood open before him and he finds legitimate money coming to him from where he did not expect it. With all the positives mentioned by the commentators in the vision Cheese and eating it in a dream, there are bound to be different opinions, but in any case they are not considered largely negative. They showed that it appears that he is suffering from a fairly mild illness, which he overcomes in a short time. Seeing one eating cheese in a dream and having spoiled it may symbolize corruption in religion or lack of money and the dreamer’s loss of his money or in his family, which brings him sorrows and worries. Eating Cheese in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imams Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi said: Cheese in its meaning symbolizes not being exhausted or putting in effort to earn money, and they also said: If he eats it with nuts, a person will get sick for a while. He will recover soon (God willing) and there are many other indications of this, and the vision according to its various details is presented in the following points: It is said that eating cheese or seeing it in a bowl is a sign of the approaching date of childbirth in which the pregnant woman will give birth to a good and healthy boy. As for the young man who Looking for law, goodness, purity and stability in life, God directs him to what he loves and is loved, and soon he will be united with a girl with good morals and beautiful beauty, who will be his. A companion and a soul mate. Among the interpretations that were mentioned when he eats it according to the circumstances of the one who sees it in his dream is that it reflects the extent of the brokenness and humiliation that characterizes the dreamer, and no one should break it except the Creator, Glory be to Him. him even y

title: Interpretation of a dream about ants for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ants for a single woman in a dream: Ants express many associations that vary depending on considerations, including the color of the ants, as they can be black or red, and according to the size of the ants, they can be large or small, as well as the location of the ants, they can be in a bed or in a public place. What concerns us in this article is that we single out the dream of ants for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about ants for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about ants for a single woman. The vision of ants expresses people, human relationships, daily transactions, and the battles that every person fights to achieve his goal by the means he deems appropriate. And if an unmarried woman sees Ants in her dream are an indication of the challenges and competitions that determine her position among other things and the advice and instructions that she is trying to follow in order to achieve what she wants. Seeing ants is also an indication of the rejection of chaos and randomness, the tendency to plan everything big and small, setting priorities and recognizing all the facts. Before making any judgment. Also, seeing ants in her dream indicates that there are many things, despite their simplicity, that cause her discomfort and distress, and she must stop delving into the details so as not to destroy her life alone. On the other hand, this vision is an indication of a tendency towards the practical side and thinking. Continuing tomorrow and how she will manage her affairs to be prepared for any situation that may arise in her life. And if you see ants carrying food and bringing it home, this symbolizes a high profit rate, making a lot of profits and pursuing strong plans through which you can get what you want. But if it happens On the contrary, the ants carried the food and took it out of the house, this indicates shortages, exposure to a difficult period, and the presence of great psychological pressures that prevent them from living in peace. Interpretation of a dream of ants for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of ants that this vision expresses the weakness of people, and the constant fear of tomorrow and what it holds. To them, deal with events with extreme caution, preferring discretion over confrontation and expression. Honest opinion. Ants in a dream may indicate a gathering of people, a large number of soldiers, a long lineage and children, a long life or a succession of events. If an unmarried girl sees ants in her dream, this is an indication of marriage in the near future or the presence of many adjustments that she will make In her life to bring about a comprehensive change in all aspects of the personality. Also, seeing ants in their dreams is evidence of the abundance of money and profits and achieving a large percentage of profit, which prompts them to focus on the professional aspect and how to earn it and reach a level of prosperity and well-being. This vision indicates constancy, hard work, and steady steps. And obedience to orders and instructions, and the presence of previous goals and complete planning for all current and upcoming events. If you see a lot of ants, this indicates wars and battles, and these wars transform from mere presence on the ground, they turn into conflicts that take place within them and cause them anxiety and tension. The same previous vision also represents a lot Of money, so if she sees an ant hill, then this

title: What is the interpretation of seeing anger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The meaning of seeing anger in a dreamInterpretation of seeing anger in a dreamWhat does the symbol of anger mean? How did the interpreters interpret the vision of anger and screaming? Do anger and crying mean bad or good things? What is the sign of a dreamer's anger in a dream without clear reasons for this? , read below. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google website Interpretation of dreams in Egypt: Anger in a dream: If the fortuneteller sees that he is angry and shouts loudly in the dream, this indicates sadness and sorrow, because the symbol of screaming is not intimate in dreams, and if it is combined with the symbol of anger, it gets worse. But if the dreamer is angry and suddenly starts crying in the dream This indicates many problems and sorrows that the dreamer experiences, and after a while he will be surprised by the comfort and happiness that will come to him, God willing. Al-Nabulsi said that if the dreamer sees himself angry, this is a bad sign that poverty has entered his life. Sometimes anger in a dream warns him that it reveals His secrets and scandal in the society in which he lives. Extreme anger in a dream sometimes indicates health problems and incurable diseases, and the more angry the dreamer is, the more serious the disease that he will suffer soon. Anger in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that anger in a dream is a bad sign and shows the dreamer’s love For the world and its pleasures. But if the dreamer saw people in a dream who wanted to burn the Qur’an or deliberately insulted one of the symbols of religion, such as our noble Messenger, and he became angry for this reason, and continued to defend his religion throughout the dream, then the vision here indicates the strength of the dreamer’s faith and his intense love for God Almighty. If he quarrels The dreamer is with his colleagues and he is very angry in the dream, then he faces many problems related to work. Anger in the dream can be interpreted as many fears that haunt the dreamer and make him feel anxious and tired in his life. The symbol of anger can indicate many obstacles in the emotional, material or Social, depending on the person with whom the dreamer was angry. Anger in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi spoke about the symbol of anger and said that it can be interpreted as a visionary who is exposed to some life disturbances and experiences in the coming days. Al-Osaimi agreed with psychologists in interpreting this vision and said that it is They may be due to the injustice that the dreamer is experiencing in reality and making him feel tired, angry and upset, as well as a strong desire to confront the oppressors. Winning over them. All you are looking for is to know the meaning of anger in a dream. Anger in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she is very angry in a dream, knowing that she did not quarrel with anyone in the vision, and there is no need for her to get angry like this, then the dream indicates her sudden death. If the dreamer’s relationship with her fiancé is turbulent and full of quarrels in reality, and she dreams that she is angry with him and shouting at him loudly, then this is from the subconscious because of the bad relationship between them in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that her brother or father is getting very angry, then perhaps one of them will go to prison soon or One of them becomes seriously ill. title: Interpretation of scorpions in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of scorpions in a dream is one of the most frightening and frightening interpretations of dreams, because of the harm that scorpions can inflict on people. Many dream interpretation scholars have worked hard to explain interpretations of scorpions in a dream, and these interpretations vary depending on how the scorpion appears in the dream. Did the scorpion bite the priest, was it caught by the priest, was the priest killed by it, or did it walk on his body, among other things? Seeing a married woman who is neither single nor pregnant, but seeing a man is not a vision for a woman, and in general it is a summary of what dream interpretation scholars said about her. The scorpion in a dream shows a weak enemy who wants to harm you, but cannot do so, so let us learn together about the interpretation of seeing scorpions in a dream through our encyclopedia.Interpretation of scorpions in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream according to Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a scorpion in a dream with interpretations Different, such as: If one sees a scorpion in a dream. This is evidence that this person will give God Almighty a lot of goodness, but if one sees in a dream that a scorpion stings him. This is evidence that this person is afflicted with a disease, but God Almighty will save him from that disease. This is evidence that this person is crowded with people and he should stay away from him. Because the beloved does not grant him success, neither in this world nor in the afterlife. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, likened the torment of slander to a fire that consumes wood. Likewise, the miserly person loses the reward for his worship, such as prayer, fasting, zakat, or other things, in exchange for this evil that he commits. If a person sees in a dream that a scorpion has stung him and that the sting caused him severe pain. This is evidence that something unpleasant has happened to this person, and this hatred may be the loss of the money he worked for all his life, or the death of his child who he had dreamed of coming since his marriage, or both. He will become ill, and this is evidence that this person is committing illegal acts. This led to the wrath of God Almighty upon him, and he must stay away from it and consider what is permissible and what is forbidden in all his words and actions. To gain the satisfaction of God Almighty, and to exempt him from those ordeals that God afflicted him with. As a result of his actions. If a married woman sees in her dream that a scorpion stung her, and she is able to extract the venom of that scorpion; This is evidence that this woman is suffering from many difficulties in her married life, due to the desire of one of her relatives. She is not happy in her life and wants to destroy her married life, but this woman resists the actions of this man. This, if indicated, indicates the extent of this woman’s sincerity with her husband and her love for him, and her efforts to stabilize marital life, regardless of the problems she faces. This is evidence of the death of that person, but if a man sees that a scorpion stings one of his relatives. This is evidence that something bad will happen to that person and that hatred will be either illness or death, if a pregnant woman sees a scorpion in a dream. This is evidence that this woman will lose this fetus, but if the pregnant woman’s husband sees a scorpion in a dream, this is evidence that this husband will lose either one of them, the wife, or the child. It is also evidence

title: Interpretation of seeing the sky full of pine trees in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sky full of pine trees in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, pine trees are among the trees that are planted in streets and parks to give them a beautiful shape. It continues for a long period in the life of the dreamer. In this article, we will learn together about the answer to the question, the interpretation of seeing the sky full of pine trees in a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing pine trees in the sky. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says about seeing pine trees in the sky that pine trees It indicates that a person in a person’s life has a bad character, but this person is as far away from you as a tree is far away, but if one sees that he is wandering among the pine trees in the sky, this indicates that this person will enjoy good health, a sign of recovery and material prosperity, But if a young man dreams that he is planting pine trees in the sky, this indicates that this person will appear for a job opportunity and will travel abroad. But if a person sees in a dream that he is cutting down pine trees in a dream, this means that this person will have a quarrel between him and his family, Or it indicates that this person will be stoned, or perhaps this indicates that this person will do that. He will cut off his livelihood and quit his job. Ibn Sirin says that seeing pine trees in a dream is an undesirable vision. It is known that pine trees are home to crows, owls, and kites, and seeing these birds indicates poverty and the occurrence of problems and misfortunes. Ibn Sirin says: If he sees in a dream that the trees in his house are made of wood. Pines, this indicates that this house has a treacherous guard, and he sees that they are unsafe people. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pine trees in a dream. A line of sirens in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing pine trees in a dream means a lot of goodness. Interpretation of a dream about eating pine trees in a dream. Interpretation scholars say Dreams that if one sees in a dream that he is collecting pinecones from trees in the sky, this indicates that this person will make a lot of profits and money during this year. That this person works in trade and that he will make great profits and gain great fame among people, but if one sees in his dream that he collects pine cones and eats them, this indicates that this person enjoys good health and that this year will be full of kindness, wealth and good luck because wheat means an increase In material income, goodness, wealth and health.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a pine tree in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that pine trees in a dream portend goodness, but goodness is rare and very few, because pine trees have few fruits and are a place for birds of prey to find shelter. Especially if the opinion is a woman.But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is living in a pine tree, it means that her husband does not trust her. An unmarried girl saw in her dream that she was sitting among the pine trees in the sky, then this portends many good things and indicates her connection to a well-off person. But if one sees in a dream that he is wandering in the

title: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream and its effects

preview.html: The new house in a dream. It is worth noting that the new house in a dream is considered one of the visions that indicate movement and transition from one place to another, and it also shows the transition from one life to another, which is a new life. , and includes new people as well as friends. In addition to the fact that this vision includes many different interpretations and explanations, it often portends good things, and in this context we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream. The new house in a dream. Many interpreters have tried to clarify the meanings and interpretations it contains, including the scholar Ibn Sirin, where These interpretations differed based on the condition of the dreamer and what he sees in the dream with different details, and in this context I will do so. Explain to you the interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream. It is also: If the dreamer is an unmarried young man, then this vision indicates the approaching date of his marriage. It is also evidence of the arrival of goodness in his life. In addition, if the dreamer is suffering from any disease or is a member of his family. He is suffering from a disease. It is a sign of recovery from the disease, God Almighty willing. If the dreamer is disobedient and sees in his dream the new house. It means repentance for him and a return to God Almighty. For the merchant, this dream is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money, And the abundant profit that he will obtain from trade. While you see leaving the narrow house to the new, spacious house, which indicates that the problems and crises will end. See also: Interpretation of seeing olive branches in a dream for single and married women in detail. The new house in a dream for a married woman includes this vision in a dream for a married woman Many interpretations and interpretations that indicate a change in life for the better following the will of God Almighty and other various interpretations, and in this context we will learn more about the interpretation of seeing a married woman as a man’s ladies. The new house in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees this vision in a dream and does not give birth. This dream is evidence that she will give birth, and it also shows the date of her approaching pregnancy, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is moving from an old house to a new house, it means stability in her married life. Likewise, if a married woman is seen leaving the house for the new house without the presence of her husband. It means that there are some problems that will arise between her and her husband that will lead to divorce, and God is Great and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. The new house in a dream for divorced women, as this dream includes many different connotations, meanings, and connotations based on social status. For the viewer, and many dream interpreters who have tried to clarify these meanings, and along these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of the vision. The new house in the dream of divorced women. This is explained in the following lines of this paragraph: Seeing a new house in a dream for a divorced woman. It is evidence of repentance for committing sins. In addition Therefore, it expresses a return to God Almighty, as well as a vision of rain

title: Fear of a gecko in a married woman’s dream

preview.html: Fear of a gecko in a dream for a married woman Seeing a gecko in reality is frightening and disturbing to many, which is also known as leprosy or gecko, which is characterized by its high speed of movement, and therefore seeing it in a dream is disturbing to the dreamer, indicating an incident of something commendable in reality, and in general, the interpretation of dreams is something that depends to some extent on the jurisprudence of scholars, which can affect the interpreter in the dream or make mistakes, because the unseen is in the hands of God alone, and He alone knows, and among the interpretations related to seeing a gecko in a dream is his fear of a married woman, and this is what we explain to you in the Encyclopedia: Seeing fear of a gecko in a dream indicates the occurrence of disputes between a married woman and her husband in reality, and God knows best. And this vision is one of the warning visions for those who seek to spoil the dreamer's marital life, and God knows best. When you see fear of a gecko in a dream and it was in the dreamer's room, this indicates the presence of a person trying to cause disputes between the dreamer and her husband in reality. Also, one of the indications of this dream is fear of a gecko in a dream, that it is an indication of the dreamer's good condition and enjoyment of good morals in reality. The escape of the gecko In a dream for a married woman, scholars interpreted the vision of a gecko running in a dream as a sign that the dreamer is escaping from the problems he faces. This vision expresses the escape of a person who has wronged the dreamer in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a gecko chasing me for a married woman If the dreamer sees that the gecko is chasing her in a dream, this indicates the bad behavior emanating from her. Seeing a gecko chasing the dreamer in the bathroom indicates that this is a sign of the danger that is chasing her, and God knows best. If the gecko is chasing the dreamer in a dream and she is able to get rid of it, this indicates the dreamer's ability to overcome the difficulties he faces in his life. If the gecko is chasing a married woman in a dream and killing her, this indicates getting rid of the worries he suffers from, in addition to overcoming enemies. Interpretation of a dream of a dead gecko for a married woman If the dreamer sees a dead gecko in a dream and it is small in size, this indicates the differences that appear between her and her family and friends. If a dead gecko is seen in the dreamer's house, this indicates that the dreamer is facing difficulties in his family life. The symbol of the gecko in a dream for a married woman carries Seeing a gecko in a dream for a married woman has many of the following interpretations: If the dreamer sees many geckos in her house in a dream and gets rid of them, this indicates that those who have enmity and hatred have entered her house and she was able to end her relationship with them. Also, seeing many geckos in a dream indicates the spread of gossip and gossip. If you see a yellow gecko in a dream, this indicates contamination from envy or illness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that the gecko is walking on the body of her son, this indicates that her son is affected by envy in reality. When the dreamer sees a breast eating her body, this indicates that she is exposed to sins and gossip. Scholars interpreted the vision of a gecko
